q_en: What sewing tasks will Elite Sewers be assigned before June 30, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT st.* FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Elite Sewers' AND st.end_time < '2024-06-30';
steps.description: To find the sewing tasks that customers with the name 'Elite Sewers' will be assigned before June 30, 2024, we need to retrieve the sewing tasks based on the customer name and the end time before the specified date.
